messages.message: Hi, I’m really disappointed with Microsoft Office. It feels like it’s contributing to environmental harm rather than helping sustainability efforts.
I understand your concerns, Xander. Microsoft Office has made some claims about sustainability, but I can see how you might be skeptical given recent reports.
Exactly. It seems like they’re just talking without actually implementing eco-friendly practices. My trust in their environmental commitments is pretty low now.
Thank you for sharing your feedback. I’ll make sure to pass this concern to the relevant team. Is there anything specific you’d like Microsoft Office to do differently?
Honestly, I’d like them to be transparent about their sustainability initiatives and actively reduce their carbon footprint instead of just marketing green messages.
That’s a very valid point. We appreciate your honesty and will use your feedback to advocate for more genuine sustainability efforts.
